SceneDescription.name: Library
SceneDescription.description:
Assassin: "Listen, can you just please stop throwing those? My job is already hard enough as it is."
Maid: "I'm sorry! Ah- I mean...go away! I'm sorry!"
Maid: "...please don't kill me."
Assassin: "Calm down, I'm not going to kill you. I just want you to stop making a mess."
Maid: "B-but...how are we supposed to make Mr. Borkus be nicer to us?"
